name: Simple Boxing Drills VR
description:
SImple Boxing Drills VR is a boxing fitness app that casually simulates the experience of hitting the mitts in a boxing class:
  • contains a number of mitt drills
  • allows users to select specific drills to customize their experiences
  • allows users to adjust the positions of the mitts



credits:
  • "Boxing Gloves - Right Handed" by Gohar.Munir is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution
  • Training icons created by juicy_fish - Flaticon
